撱字的基本解释

撱
wěi
抛弃。
抚摸。
撞。

撱
tuǒ
古同“橢”。

撱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tuǒ］
［《廣韻》他果切，上果，透。］
亦作“撱1”。亦作“楕1”。“隋2”的被通假字。“椭1”的繁体字。“隨3”的被通假字。
(1)长圆形。
(2)长圆形的容器。

撱字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　撱； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页457第01
【唐韻】他果切【集韻】【正韻】吐火切，?音妥。狹長也。【爾雅·釋魚】?小而撱。【註】撱，小貝狹長也。謂長而去四角也。【史記·平準書】白金三品，其三曰復小撱之直三百。　又【唐韻】羊捶切【集韻】尹捶切，?隋上聲。與㨊同。棄也。又捫也。　又【集韻】翾規切，音墮。亦棄也。○按《爾雅》《廣韻》《集韻》或譌作橢，惟《正韻》撱橢分義各出。通作隋。

撱字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
撱字的起名意思

暂无。

clip
wěi
abandon.

hit.
clip
tuǒ
The ancient same "ellipse".
clip
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tuǒ］
["Guangyun" He cuts, puts on the fruit, and sees through. ]
Also known as "撱1". Also known as "Eul 1". "Sui 2" was passed falsely. "Ellipse 1" in traditional characters. "Sui 3" was passed falsely.
(1) Oblong.
(2) An oblong container.
clip
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　撱; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 457 No. 01
[Tang Yun] He cuts fruitfully [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] breathes fire and cuts, the sound is correct. It's long and narrow. 【Erya·Shiyu】? Small and piping. [Note] 撱, Beckham is also long and narrow. That is long away from the four corners. 【Historical Records·Leveling Book】Three grades of platinum, the third of which is Fu Xiaoqizhizhi three hundred.　[Tang Yun] Sheep beat and cut [Ji Yun] Yin beat and cut, Sui Shangsheng. Same as 㨊. Abandon also. Pause again.　 [Ji Yun] The rules are cut, and the sound falls. Also abandoned. ○According to "Erya", "Guangyun", "Jiyun" or "Zhao" as oval, but "Zhengyun" is divided into oval meaning. Pass for Sui.
